abstract: Returns the value of a lighting attribute.
overview:
## Return Value

The value of the lighting attribute, or `nil` if no such attribute exists.

## Discussion

A light’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/type] property determines its set of available attributes.

You can also get the values of lighting attributes using [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/DevPedia-CocoaCore/KeyValueCoding.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008195-CH25]. The key path for each lighting attribute is listed in [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/lighting-attribute-keys].

# attribute(forKey:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the value of a lighting attribute.

## Declaration

```swift
func attribute(forKey key: String) -> Any?
```

## Parameters

- **key**: A constant specifying a lighting attribute. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/lighting-attribute-keys] for available keys and their possible values.

## Return Value

The value of the lighting attribute, or `nil` if no such attribute exists.

## Discussion

A light’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/type] property determines its set of available attributes.

You can also get the values of lighting attributes using [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/General/Conceptual/DevPedia-CocoaCore/KeyValueCoding.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40008195-CH25]. The key path for each lighting attribute is listed in [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/lighting-attribute-keys].

## Managing Light Attributes

- **name**: A name associated with the light.
- **setAttribute(_:forKey:)**: Sets the value for a lighting attribute.
- **Lighting Attribute Keys**: Keys for specifying the behavior of a light using the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/attribute(forKey:)] and [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNLight/setAttribute(_:forKey:)] methods.
